Package org.apache.juneau.internal

Class FileWriterBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.internal.FileWriterBuilder
public final class FileWriterBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for creating FileWriter objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FileWriterBuilder()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FileWriterBuilder append()
    Sets the append mode on the writer to true.
    FileWriterBuilder buffered()
    Sets the buffer mode on the writer to true.
    java.io.Writer build()
    Creates a new File writer.
    FileWriterBuilder charset​(java.lang.String cs)
    Sets the character encoding of the file.
    FileWriterBuilder charset​(java.nio.charset.Charset cs)
    Sets the character encoding of the file.
    static FileWriterBuilder create()
    Creates a new builder.
    static FileWriterBuilder create​(java.io.File file)
    Creates a new builder initialized with the specified file.
    static FileWriterBuilder create​(java.lang.String path)
    Creates a new builder initialized with the specified file path.
    FileWriterBuilder file​(java.io.File file)
    Sets the file being written to.
    FileWriterBuilder file​(java.lang.String path)
    Sets the path of the file being written to.
